hymn.title: Though your sins be as scarlet

layout.singingstanza: "Though your sins be as scar -- let, They shall be as white as snow; Though your sins be as scar -- let, They shall be as white as snow; Though they be red as crim -- son, They shall be as wool;" "Though your sins be as scar -- let, Though your sins be as scar -- let, They shall be as white as snow, They shall be as white as snow.

lyrics.stanza: "Though your sins be as scarlet, They shall be as white as snow; Though your sins be as scarlet, They shall be as white as snow; Though they be red as crimson, They shall be as wool;" "Though your sins be as scarlet, Though your sins be as scarlet, They shall be as white as snow, They shall be as white as snow.

Hear the voice that entreats you, O return ye unto God! Hear the voice that entreats you, O return ye unto God! He is of great compassion, And of wondrous love; Hear the voice that entreats you, Hear the voice that entreats you, O return ye unto God! O return ye unto God!

He'll forgive your transgressions, And remember them no more; He'll forgive your transgressions, And remember them no more; "Look unto Me, ye people," Saith the Lord your God! He'll forgive your transgressions, He'll forgive your transgressions, And remember them no more, And remember them no more.
